entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
